name: ddf--cait--historical_emissions
author: Gapminder
description: CAIT Historic allows for easy access, analysis and visualization of the latest available international greenhouse gas emissions data. It includes information for 186 countries, 50 U.S. states, 6 gases, multiple economic sectors, and 160 years - carbon dioxide emissions for 1850-2013 and multi-sector greenhouse gas emission for 1990-2013.
title: CAIT - Historical Emissions Data (Countries, U.S. States, UNFCCC)
